#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int array[1000000];
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n1,n2;
		cin>>n1>>n2;
		int count=0;
		for(int i=2;i<=sqrt(n2);++i)
		{
			if(array[i]==0)
			{
				for(int j=i*i;j<=n2;j+=i)
				{
					array[j]=1;
				}
			}
		}
		for(int i=n1;i<=n2;++i)
		{
			if(!array[i])
				count++;
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
}
